required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: MeFirst: A Tailored Intervention to HPV Vaccine Decision Making
clinical_study.official_title: MeFirst: A Tailored Intervention to HPV Vaccine Decision Making

brief_summary.textblock: This study will test whether a tailored, online educational intervention increases HPV vaccine uptake and intent among female college students.

detailed_description.textblock: Me First is the first web-based, online, educational tool designed to promote Human Papillomavirus (HPV) vaccine awareness and understanding in an effort to improve HPV vaccine intent and uptake among female university students. HPV is the most common sexually transmitted infection and causes genital warts and cancer. The HPV vaccine has been recommended for girls ages 11-26 since 2006, yet vaccination rates remain low. Tailored online interventions may be more effective tools to promote behavior change among college students than traditional static interventions. The proposed study is a randomized controlled trial testing the efficacy of the Me First tool vs. standard static educational material on increasing HPV vaccination intent and uptake among female university students aged 18-26.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Investigator), Primary Purpose: Health Services Research

primary_outcome.measure: Determine the effect of Me First, a tailored, online HPV vaccination decision-making guide on HPV vaccination intention and/or uptake.

secondary_outcome.measure: Determine the effect of Me First on HPV-related knowledge.

other_outcome.measure: Determine acceptability of the Me First tool to participants immediately post-test.

arm_group.description: Participants will receive the CDC Fact sheet about HPV vaccination while they are taking the survey.

intervention.description: Participants will be lead through an interactive web-based tool that is tailored to their responses during the survey. This tool provides information regarding HPV Vaccination.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- enrolled at the University of Michigan
Exclusion Criteria:
- receipt of any doses of HPV vaccine
